plot: A beautiful grand Victorian bed intended to commemorate a life of blissful matrimony that never transpired, serves as a painful reminder of Miss Roses' spinsterhood. Will her desires of finding love & marriage find requital one day?
title: Rose Bed
plot_es: A beautiful grand Victorian bed intended to commemorate a life of blissful matrimony that never transpired, serves as a painful reminder of Miss Roses' spinsterhood. Will her desires of finding love & marriage find requital one day?
